name: The Adventures of Buckaroo Banzai
overview: A tie-in to the 1984 film The Adventures of Buckaroo Banzai :Across the 8th Dimension, you play Dr. Banzai that ultimately tries to overcome a potentially planet-destroying bomb set by the Black Lectroids, inhabitants of Planet 10. The game was later converted to theoretically every platform thanks to a pair of open source tools that can be used to convert all the original Scott Adams games back to source code and then compile it to the target system. Amiga conversion was done in 2003.
